title: (x) Looking for Olnova - Helvetica clone {Stephen}
content:
Hello,

It would seem that Olnova no longer exists, does anyone know what name it goes under now and where it can be purchased from?

 [‹ "Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey" shaded compressed Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080657/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20470 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Germany 2006 World Cup - Serpentine {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080657/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20471 "Go to next forum topic")
author: roboah

comments.content: My research indicates it’s a knockoff, so there’s a good chance we can find the original. Got a sample?

Here is an image of it

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Olnova_6225.jpg)
Yep. Looks like good ol’ [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080657/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=Helvetica) to me.

Actually, it looks more like Neue Helvetica. Also, I’ve seen that a with the flat right side numerous times in corporate identities, maybe this is a customised Neue Helvetica? Just throwing it out there...
[There is a story about the Olnova here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080657/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/greenstreet.pdf). Another font forgery story. No shortage of these.
